price: ហើយពួកគេបានយកព្រះនានាមកគោរពសក្ការៈផេ្សងពី អល់ឡោះ ដើម្បីឱ្យព្រះទាំងនោះការពារពួកគេ។
arabic: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لِّيَكُونُواْ لَهُمۡ عِزّٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi ālihatan liyakūnū lahum ʿizzan
